name: Halloween in Quarantine
description:
Play as Emilia who's playing truant with her parents during the quarantine period to sneak out to experience the halloween vibes!

Little did she expect to meet a mysterious cute boy.

This game is a submission for the Spooktober jam! It's done in less than a week together with my lil' sister to celebrate Halloween! Do let me know what you think about the game in the comments below!

Features:

* 1 good ending and 1 bad ending (Hint: your first two choices matter!)

* Interactive storyline

* Content warning: violence, murder.

Credits:

*Art, Writing and Programming by mintcoloredeye and her little sister

*Music provided by No Copyright Music (https://www.youtube.com/c/royaltyfreezone)

Music used: Dark Dream, Fear1 by PeriTune,  Sweet Little Lullaby by Darren Curtis (https://soundcloud.com/sei_peridot/peritunematerial-fear1royalty-free-music)

(https://soundcloud.com/desperate-measurez/dark-music-box-and-choir-sweet-little-...)
